galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Grookey
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: When it uses its special stick to strike up a beat, the sound waves produced carry revitalizing energy to the plants and flowers in the area.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Thwackey
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: The faster a Thwackey can beat out a rhythm with its two sticks, the more respect it wins from its peers.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Rillaboom
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: By drumming, it taps into the power of its special tree stump. The roots of the stump are also used as weapons.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Scorbunny
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: A warm-up run gets fire energy coursing through its body. Once that happens, it's ready to fight at full power.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Raboot
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: It kicks berries in the air and juggles them with its feet, practicing its footwork.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Cinderace
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: It juggles a pebble with its feet, turning it into a burning soccer ball. Its shots strike opponents hard and leave them scorched.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Sobble
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: When scared, this Pokémon cries. Its tears pack the chemical punch of 100 onions, and attackers won't be able to resist weeping.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Drizzile
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: A clever combatant, this Pokémon battles using water balloons created with moisture secreted from its palms.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Inteleon
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: It has many hidden capabilities, such as fingertips that can shoot water and a membrane on its back that it can use to glide through the air.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Skwovet
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: It eats berries nonstop. If its cheeks are empty, it becomes uneasy.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Greedent
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: It stuffs berries in its tail to eat later. The berries in its tail are said to be the tastiest.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Rookidee
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: It will bravely challenge any foe, no matter how powerful. This Pokémon benefits from every battle, even if it loses.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Corvisquire
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: It is intelligent enough to use tools in battle, throwing pebbles at its foes and using vines to entangle them.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Corviknight
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: This Pokémon reigns supreme in the skies of the Galar region. The black luster of its steel body could drive terror into the heart of any foe.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Blipbug
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: A constant collector of information, this Pokémon is very smart. It's a popular Pokémon for kids who live in cities.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Dottler
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: It is a Pokémon that has a hard shell. It can use its psychic power to see what is happening on the other side of its shell.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Orbeetle
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: It's famous for its high intelligence, and the large size of its brain is proof that it also possesses immense psychic power.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Nickit
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: A cunning Pokémon, it steals food from others. It uses its tail to wipe away its footprints so it can't be tracked.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Thievul
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: It secretly marks potential targets with a scent. By following the scent, it stalks its targets and steals from them when they least expect it.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Gossifleur
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: It anchors itself in the ground with its single leg, then basks in the sun. After absorbing enough sunlight, its petals spread open.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Eldegoss
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: The cotton on its head is thick and fluffy. The seeds attached to it are said to be nutritious and tasty.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Wooloo
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: Its curly fleece is such an effective cushion that this Pokémon could fall off a cliff and stand right back up at the bottom, unharmed.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Dubwool
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: Weave a carpet from its springy wool, and you end up with something closer to a trampoline. You'll bounce right back up off it.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Chewtle
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: It starts off battles by attacking with its rock-hard horn, but as soon as the opponent flinches, this Pokémon bites down and never lets go.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Drednaw
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: This Pokémon is so strong and its bite is so powerful that it can chew through iron beams and rock.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Yamper
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: This Pokémon is very popular as a herding dog in the Galar region. As it runs, it generates electricity from the base of its tail.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Boltund
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: It sends electricity through its legs to boost their strength. Running at top speed, it easily breaks 50 mph.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Rolycoly
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: Most of its body has the same composition as coal. It was born from a coal seam about 400 years ago.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Carkol
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: It forms coal inside its body. It is said to have been born from a coal seam.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Coalossal
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: It's a peaceful Pokémon, but it will ferociously retaliate against those who vandalize mines.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Applin
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: It lives in an apple. It is said that the flavor of the apple determines its evolution.
galar_pokedex_part_1.evolution: Evolves into Flapple (with a Tart Apple) or Appletun (with a Sweet Apple).

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Flapple
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: It ate a sour apple, and that induced its evolution. It flies on wings of apple skin and spits a powerful acid.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Appletun
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: Eating a sweet apple caused its evolution. Its body is covered in a nectar that can heal wounds.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Silicobra
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: It spews sand from its nostrils. While the enemy is blinded, it burrows into the ground to hide.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Sandaconda
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: When it contracts its body, it shoots sand with such force that it can pulverize boulders.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Cramorant
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: It's so strong that it can knock out some opponents in a single hit, but it also may forget what it's battling mid-fight.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Arrokuda
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: If it sees any movement around it, this Pokémon charges for it straightaway, leading with its sharply pointed jaw.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Barraskewda
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: This Pokémon has a jaw that's as sharp as a spear and as strong as steel. It takes aim at its prey and rushes forward at over 100 knots.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Toxel
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: It stores poison in an internal poison sac and secretes that poison through its skin.
galar_pokedex_part_1.evolution: Evolves into Toxtricity. The form depends on its Nature.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Toxtricity
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: When this Pokémon sounds as if it's strumming a guitar, it's actually clawing at the protrusions on its chest to generate electricity.
galar_pokedex_part_1.evolution: Final Stage. Has Amped and Low Key Forms.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Sizzlipede
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: It stores flammable gas in its body and uses it to generate heat. The yellow sections on its belly get particularly hot.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Centiskorch
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: When it heats up, its body temperature reaches about 1,500 degrees Fahrenheit. It lashes its body like a whip and launches itself at enemies.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Clobbopus
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: It's very curious, but its thoughts are simple. It plays with its tentacles and sometimes rips them off, but they grow back.
galar_pokedex_part_1.evolution: Evolves into Grapploct after learning Taunt.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Grapploct
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: A body made up of nothing but muscle makes the grappling moves this Pokémon performs with its tentacles tremendously powerful.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Sinistea
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: This Pokémon is said to have been born when a lonely spirit possessed a cold, leftover cup of tea.
galar_pokedex_part_1.evolution: Evolves into Polteageist with a Chipped Pot or Cracked Pot.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Polteageist
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: This Pokémon is said to have been born when a lonely spirit possessed a cold, leftover cup of tea.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Hatenna
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: Via the protrusion on its head, it senses other creatures' emotions. If you don't have a calm disposition, it will never warm up to you.

galar_pokedex_part_1.name: Hattrem
galar_pokedex_part_1.description: No matter who you are, if you bring strong emotions near this Pokémon, it will silence you violently.
